Q: "Doctor, before you performed the autopsy, did you check for a pulse?"

A: "No."

Q: "Did you check for blood pressure?"

A: "No."

Q: "Did you check for breathing?"

A: "No."

Q: "So, then it is possible that the patient was alive when you began the autopsy?"

A: "No."

Q: "How can you be so sure, doctor?"

A: "Because his brain was sitting on my desk in a jar."

Q: "But could the patient have still been alive nevertheless?"

A: "It is possible that he could have been alive and practicing law somewhere."
Wow.  I hadn't realized its been a month since I've updated.  Maybe I should do that.

Your Seduction Stye: "Prized Object"

The seduction game you play is tried, true, and still effective: hard to get.

You know that the best seducers turn the tables - and get their crush to seduce them.

The one running has the power, and you're a challenge that is worth the chase.


You are a master of enticing and pulling back. Giving a little and taking some away.

You are controlled enough to know rewards come after a long seduction dance.

Even though you want to call, email, or say "I love you" first - you don't!


You're style is the perfect mix of hot and cold - so much so that you have many suitors

Think Holly Golightly from Breakfast at Tiffany's ... or any of those creepy guys from the Bachelor

You're skilled at inspiring a chase. The real test is picking the person to slow down for..

What Kind of Seducer Are You?

First of all Happy New Year.  I've had lots of stuff going on in the past few days.  I'll start with the happier stuff I guess.

On New Year's Eve I had to work a Murder Mystery.  Which was fun yet crazy.  We had 2 shows going on at the same time in the same building.  We had 2 stage managers running the shows and one house manager running between the two.  I know he was tired after they were over.  I was the stage manager for the larger show.  We had a few timing issues with the food but over all it went well.  The show ended at 9:35 which was only 5 min. over time.  After the show the cast and crew were given gift cert. to the bar in the hotel we were at.  The food at this place is awsome.  I took mine home though because of it being New Years.  I didn't want to drive home with all of the drunks.  On my way home I had to stop at a DUI check point.  There were cops everywhere.  All they did though was asked me a few questions and sent me on my way.  It was kinda fun.  I wanted to drive though again but thought better of it.  LOL

On January 10 there are 3 Murder Mysteries going on (different locations) and they contracted me to do one of them.  I am moving to Greely on January 9 but I agreed to come back and do one of the shows.  Its only an hour drive away.  I talk to the priducer and asked to if I could do one of the shows close to my house.  That way I could drop off stuff if I needed to and then just go back to Greely.  i'm figuring the latest I will be getting back is around midnight.  That's no to bad.  

Yesterday was my last day at my last job.  I was kinda sad to go.  Eveyone was telling me good luck and everything.  

Yesterday when I was driving to work  I saw a sight you don't normally see to much in the city.  In one of the neighborhood trees there was a blad eagle.  I was so happy to see that.  I wished I had a camera with me.  I have never seen one in the wild like that.  At first I thought it was the neighborhood owl.  That's the picture I've put up for this enter.   The eagle was a real treat for me yesterday.

Ok now for the not so happy stuff.  I wanted to put this last in case I start crying.  My grandmother had surgery on New Year's Eve.  To my understanding the surgery went fine but she's not doing all that good now.  They havn't been able to stop her from bleeding.  They have been giving her blood and plasma.  They are afraid her body is going to start rejecting the blood and stuff because they have had to give her so much.  My dad he really taking it bad.  I don't blame him its his mother.  He's beginning to blame himself for taking her to the hospital.  The whole family is really stressed right now.  Things are being said I don't think anyone means but its rough right now.  I think we are all fearing the same thing.
Grandma goes in for surgery tomarrow.  Needless to say I'm a little worried.

I hope everyone's holidays are well.  

It looks like I will have enough money to buy a computer for myself.  I also got some DVDs I've wanted.  But Grandma is back in the hospital.  My partents took her there a couple of hours ago.  She's bleeding internally again and they said she has water on her lungs.  I keep getting this felling this is our last Christmas with her.  She did like the throw blanket I got for her.  I'm glad of that.

Well I had some split answers so her are my two resoponces.

I got this from my mother.

Read this question, come up with an answer and then scroll down to the bottom for the result. This is not a trick question. It is as it reads. 
No one I know has gotten it right - including me.

 A woman, while at the funeral of her own mother, met this guy whom she did not know. She thought this guy was amazing, so much her dream guy she believed him to be, that she fell in love with him right there but never asked for his number and could not find him. A few days later she killed  her sister.

 Question: What is her motive in killing her sister?
 (Give this some thought before you answer)







<lj-cut text="Answer"> 



 Answer:

She was hoping that the guy would appear at the funeral again. If you answered this correctly, you think like a psychopath.
This was a test by a famous American Psychologist used to test if one has the same mentality as a killer. Many arrested serial killers took part in the test and answered the question correctly. If you didn't answer the  question correctly good for you. If you got the answer correct, please let me know so I can take you off of my e-mail list unless that will tick you off, then I'll just be extra nice to you from now on. 

</lj-cut>

I have about 20 min until I'm off for Turkey Day. 

Turkey Turkey Turkey.

Although sometimes you may seem emotionally

people's feelings and have tremendous empathy.
Sometimes you have a tendency to neglect your

i'm not really sure why but I'm not at all happy today.  I know part of it is my grandmother but at the same time there seems to be more but I don't know what it is.

I'm going to have to start from the beginning.  My grandma has been have some trouble with swelling in her legs.  The swelling has been so bad that she gets blisters on her legs.  On Thurs my Mother had gone up to her house a couple of times to change the bandages.  My mom said she would no more than get the gauze on her leg and it would be saoked.  

Fri they took her to the doctor.  The doctor couldn't find anything wrong at the time but ran some blood tests.  

Sat morning we got a call telling us we needed to take her to the hospital because her blood count was low.  The hospital did a blood transfustion but it didn't help.  They thought she was bleeding internally somewhere.  They thought it was in her stomach

Today they did a scope check on her digestive track in both directions.  They found a couple of places where she was bleeding and were able to fix them.  However they also found a lump in her intestine.  They did a biopsy and now we are waiting to find out if its cancer or not.

The worst thing is I have a bad cold and I can't go see her.  Her immune system is really down right now and the cold I have is really bad.  If she were to catch it it wouldn't be good.  So I havn't seen her at all.

I think I'm in a better mood now.  I'm trying to write an email advertisement for the December Murder Mysteries.  All I've come up with so far is morbid parodies to Christmas Carols.  Oh well I'll keep thinking.

I hate being sick.  I woke up at 4am having a massive caoughing attack.  To top it all off when I went upstairs to get cough syrup there was only enough in the bottle for a child.  GRRRRR.

Oh well at least I have this afternoon off from work.

The way that you earn your living may be changing vastly, Carla. Unexpected career breaks may continue to come throughout the year, perhaps to the point where you find yourself in an entirely different profession. Where money is concerned, it may be a case of "it never rains but it pours." After years of being broke, you may find yourself sitting pretty! Continue working hard and let it all come! You deserve it!


Lord I hope so.
In my sicked state I have thought about writing a very sarcastic stand up comedy routien.  Don't know that I will but the thought had crossed my mind.
I can't shake this cold. It really sucks. I'm a Gin & Tonic, discover your ALcoHoLiC personality!

Well its almost time that I will have to leave for the busiest night of the year for the costume store and I'm not feeling well.  I'm not sure if I'm really sick or if I'm so tired that I just can't function anymore. Maybe a bit of both.  Oh well. I think I might ask my boss if I can leave as soon as we get all the people out of the store.

Hey all the good news it I will be done complaining about this on Monday.  :)

I took this resevtion this morning.  I just got back to the office and I started to print the confirmation and totally forgot I took the reservation this morning.

I would have to blame it on the fact that I didn't get home from work last night till 1am. We closed the store last night at 9pm.  It took us 3 and 1/2 hours to make the store look even somewhat like a store again.  It was sad.  It still was a disaster but at 12:15 the boss was like ok finish what you are doing and go home.  The cool thing was seeing it was officially Friday she gave us our pay checks.  

I think I will take a little nap at my desk now.  (I wish)
